titles.title: CARA 2.0 Act of 2020
CARA 2.0 Act of 2020
A bill to provide support with respect to the prevention of, treatment for, and recovery from, substance use disorder.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
CARA 2.0 Act of 2020
This bill expands various programs and activities to address substance use disorders, including by requiring research on prevention strategies and treatment modalities; supporting workforce education and training; revising federal regulation of opioids; and increasing access to medication-assisted treatment and other recovery services.
